definition: to make up (one's face)/to dress/(of one's dress) beautiful
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to make up/elaborately made up woman
desirable number (for one's telephone, licence plate etc) (i.e. one that includes memorable or auspicious combinations of digits)

sentences.english: A trip to Dubai at the end of March has long been in Allen's planning for Fairy King Prawn.
sentences.chinese: 愛倫早就計劃讓靚蝦王在三月尾遠征杜拜。

sentences.english: How are you gonna catch the eye of the girl across the room when you're staring at the ground?
sentences.chinese: 當你盯着地面的時候怎麼看路過的靚嫚呢？

sentences.english: Three reasons, red papaya soup rejuvenation pretty body.
sentences.chinese: 理由三，紅酒木瓜靚湯嫩膚靚全身。

sentences.english: " Japanese cuisine is concerned, " really inexpensively at attractive prices, " ah.
sentences.chinese: 以日本料理來講，“真系又平又靚”啊。
